message: This proposal divides the money 3:1 in favor of Alice. I believe it's fair given the risk and value depreciation over rounds.
This is a fair offer, considering the risk and depreciation. It allows us both to get a decent amount, and avoids further devaluation of the money.
I propose an equal division of the funds to ensure fairness. This maintains the integrity of the agreement and avoids any potential resentment.
